node.title: Dubai Land Department conducts valuations worth $78bn in 2017

content.raw:
{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The Dubai Land Department (DLD) conducted 8,173 real estate

 highest value ever recorded.
